room_title: Escape room "Stuck in the 70’s" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We just did the Lost in 70s and had so much fun! We were only 1 clue away from getting out but we'll definitely be back again! So glad this place is close and the guys were awesome. This is definitely a fun activity for parents looking to escape the kids lol

room_title: Escape room "Stuck in the 70’s" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: We did the 70s room and it was a blast! Highly recommend doing this escape room.

room_title: Escape room "Stuck in the 70’s" by Lost in Lutz Escape Rooms in Tampa
review: In our group of four, two of us had done several escape rooms, and for two of us it was our first escape room experience. We all agreed that the 70's was clever with some fun twists; a good balance between challenging yet not overwhelmingly difficult, nor overly easy to figure out. On our way out, we were already discussing when to go back to do the 2nd (more difficult) room. Great fun all around!
